title: About League Festival: Found this picture online need Rioter response!
body:
My friend and I are planning on going to League Festival on the 28th and we're really excited. We just wanted to know if this image we found online will be available for pictures during or after the event. Really interested! Thanks in advance. 


https://gyazo.com/08a3adf50f1ad350c020badc89cc5d44

replies.body:
I really have no idea. >.<  I don't see this listed on the [Finals Experience page](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/finals-experience-la-live).

I suggest posting this to the [eSports boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports) to see if anyone working or designing the event can provide this information. Let me know if you have any other questions.
